metadata.title: CVE-2022-36763 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
EDK2 is susceptible to a vulnerability in the Tcg2MeasureGptTable()function, allowing a user to trigger a heap buffer overflow via a localnetwork. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may result in acompromise of confidentiality, integrity, and/or availability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-36763` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ovmf - 0~20191122.bd85bf54-2ubuntu3.5
qemu-efi - 0~20191122.bd85bf54-2ubuntu3.5
qemu-efi-aarch64 - 0~20191122.bd85bf54-2ubuntu3.5
qemu-efi-arm - 0~20191122.bd85bf54-2ubuntu3.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: edk2 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0~20191122.bd85bf54-2ubuntu3.5').
